thread.title: Best Ways to Stay Connected When Traveling Far From Home
thread.title_full: Best Ways to Stay Connected When Traveling Far From Home

author: Susan Kohlback
title: Best Ways to Stay Connected When Traveling Far From Home
text:
July 20, 2015 | By Susan Kohlback More 
New trends in communicating with loved ones when you’re traveling to Mexico, Canada and Across The Pond. I arrived home today from a weekend away and look what was waiting for me on the doorstep. 
Oh the bennies of a blogger’s life….Okay T-Mobile, you have my full attention! The gist of the package is to focus my attention on Canada (Candian Club) and Mexico (Petron Tequila), and how easy it is to stay in contact across boarders with T-Mobile’s new international calling plans. I’m with you T-Mobile, let’s examine their new international communication plans.
